scripts.build: echo '=== DEBUG: Checking .env file ===' && ls -la .env 2>/dev/null || echo '.env file not found' && if [ -f .env ] && grep -q 'VITE_RELEASE_TAG=' .env; then echo '.env exists with VITE_RELEASE_TAG, contents:' && cat .env && VITE_RELEASE_TAG=$(grep 'VITE_RELEASE_TAG=' .env | cut -d'=' -f2 | tr -d '') && echo "Extracted VITE_RELEASE_TAG: '$VITE_RELEASE_TAG'" && VITE_RELEASE_TAG="$VITE_RELEASE_TAG" vite build; else echo 'VITE_RELEASE_TAG not found in .env (or .env missing), using git fallback' && VITE_RELEASE_TAG=$(git describe --tags --abbrev=0 2>/dev/null || echo 'dev') && echo "Using git fallback: '$VITE_RELEASE_TAG'" && VITE_RELEASE_TAG="$VITE_RELEASE_TAG" vite build; fi
